property.name: accept_license_agreement
property.description: By setting this value to yes, you aggree you have read and accepted the Greenplum Database license agreenment. Installation will not occur if value is anything other than 'yes'.

property.name: installer_location
property.description: Either a file path or URI to the Greenplum database installation zip.

property.name: installation_path
property.description: The directory to install into, the directory 'greenplum-db' will be created and used for the installation.

property.name: admin_user
property.description: The Greenplum system user used to administer the cluster.

property.name: admin_password
property.description: Password for the Greenplum system user.

property.name: database_name
property.description: Name of the database to create post installation.

property.name: segments_per_node
property.description: Number of segments to create per node.

property.name: master_data_directory
property.description: Location of the master data directory.

property.name: data_directory
property.description: A pattern expresion used to generate the data directories for each segment on a host. Ranges can be specified with [BEGIN-END] where BEGIN and END are positive whole numbers. Ranges will repeat as necessary to create a data directory for each segment on a host. Additionally the current segment's number can be used by referencing {i}.

property.name: master_port
property.description: Port number for the master node.

property.name: port_base
property.description: Beginning value for the segment ports.

property.name: replication_port_base
property.description: Beginning value for the segment replication ports.

property.name: set_kernel_parameters
property.description: Whether to configure parameters in sysctl.conf and limits.conf to the recommended values.
